questions.quote: Jerry got her phone number off of an AIDS walk list? Oh, that's awful!
You left them in the car? How could you leave them in the car?
Because of me? You must be joking! Who wouldn't want to live because of me? I'm nothing!
My new salesman boyfriend took me out to celebrate his promotion.
It's preposterous! They ask someone to take off a baseball cap at a baseball game.  How can you defend that?
Nobody drives like me. Nobody. I'm doing things in this car, you have no idea they're going on. Wanna see me make a right turn from the left lane? Watch this.
You're missing out on a relationship that could enrich your life in ways that you never could have thought possible.
No! I'm not gonna do that! That's one step away from personal ads! And prostitutes! No! No, I am not going down that road! What does she look like?
Wel...I have to be something. I 'm a close friend....What about being a bridesmaid.
This show looks interesting. Isn't he that Seinfeld fellow you went out with?
